Package com.devcharles.piazzapanic

Class MainMenuScreen

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationAdapter
com.devcharles.piazzapanic.MainMenuScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener, com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
public class MainMenuScreen extends com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationAdapter implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
Main menu of the game, transitions the player to the Tutorial Slideshow on button press
